attributes.action: To accept that an individual has the right to end their own life when, medically, the quality of that life makes an indvidual feel that it is no longer worth living and suffering for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An individual of the UK has the right to cause the premature end of their life by smoking, drinking etc. And yet, an individual suffering from a terminal and/or degenerative illness has no right to choose to end their life with dignity. 

Anyone helping an individual to such an end, even by pushing their wheelchair on to a plane taking them to a country that allows such an act, can be punished with a custodial sentence under British Law. 

Petition is to recommend that individuals, as well as having a right to life,  also have a right to die in a manner of their choosing and in requesting assistance in the implementation of that right.
